description:
Full-time employees

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
45211 Monthly statistics: wholesale and commission trade
45212 Monthly statistics of retail trade
45213 Monthly statistics: accommodation and food services
45214 Monthly statistics of motor vehicle trade

Definition:
Full-time employees are persons who work the full weekly
working hours for the enterprise, i.e. the hours usually
worked per week at the local unit or location concerned.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Full-time employees
